sense.def:
To straddle something
pomeni sedeti ali stati z eno nogo na vsaki strani nečesa.

seg.quote: He straddled a chair and began fiddling with the keys.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
straddles a place
, preči neki kraj ali povezuje njegove dele.

seg.quote: A viaduct straddles the river Wye.
...a communications net that straddles the globe.
